attributes.description:
If you are looking for a trusted, reliable, multiple award-winning dealer to purchase your preowned vehicle from, then look no further. We offer certified used vehicles that you can trust and rely on at affordable prices with the best service. Let us structure a deal for you today. We offer in-house finance and pay top prices on all trade-ins. Nationwide delivery available upon request. No pre-fitted accessories are included in the price.
Pricing does not include on the road and service and delivery fees and is subject to in-house finance.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
